Text.Page:
Why the argon-twisted sikandaris are here, I'll never understand. But I know that we want 'em gone from the lower depths. Kill {@LinkCreature:46#301#argonomorph sikandaris}, {@LinkCreature:46#302#argonomorph fiends}, {@LinkCreature:46#303#argonomorph blood fiends}, and {@LinkCreature:46#304#argonomorph jalmaraks}.

Report to {@Creature:246#1027} at {@Rgn:46016} when mission is complete.

Eliminate {@LinkCreature:46#301#argonomorph sikandaris}, {@LinkCreature:46#302#argonomorph fiends}, {@LinkCreature:46#303#argonomorph blood fiends}, and {@LinkCreature:46#304#argonomorph jalmaraks}. I reward performance!
